div.p: Our teachers educated big the industry you know, the commercial photography and that, they never taught us about little things
christenings, baby photos, you know just day-to-day photography you know things that you just capture with your camera,
party photography none of that it was all fashion, fashion modelling... I’d done my own research and I found an urban photographer
I emailed him and he said “people like you are good, you know, because you don’t have no hesitation you take your camera out
and you take pictures every single day that’s what will make you become a better person”
